============================================
core/classes/nested_static_member_access_rhs
============================================

initial begin
    a = class1::class2::member1.member2;
end

----

(source_file
  (initial_construct
    (statement_or_null
      (statement
        (statement_item
          (seq_block
            (statement_or_null
              (statement
                (statement_item
                  (blocking_assignment
                    (operator_assignment
                      (variable_lvalue
                        (hierarchical_identifier
                          (simple_identifier)))
                      (assignment_operator)
                      (expression
                        (primary
                          (class_qualifier
                            (class_scope
                              (class_type
                                (simple_identifier)
                                (simple_identifier))))
                          (hierarchical_identifier
                            (simple_identifier)
                            (simple_identifier)))))))))))))))
